rolltable.description: Loot table for the Abandoned Lighthouse of Hammersend.

entries.description_basic: A simple seashell pendant with no magical properties.
entries.description_intermediate: A carved talisman that grants +1 to saving throws against water-based spells.
entries.description_advanced: A powerful talisman that allows the wearer to breathe underwater for 1 hour once per day.

entries.description_basic: A basic oil lantern that flickers in the wind.
entries.description_intermediate: A sturdy lantern that illuminates a 30-foot radius and reveals hidden paths.
entries.description_advanced: A magical lantern that casts daylight and reveals invisible creatures within its light.

entries.description_basic: A dull dagger made from coral, easily breakable.
entries.description_intermediate: A well-crafted dagger that deals an extra 1d4 damage to aquatic creatures.
entries.description_advanced: A magical dagger that returns to the wielder's hand after being thrown and deals an extra 1d6 damage to aquatic creatures.

entries.description_basic: Tattered robes with no special features.
entries.description_intermediate: Robes that provide +1 to AC and resistance to cold damage.
entries.description_advanced: Enchanted robes that grant advantage on Charisma checks when interacting with sea creatures.

entries.description_basic: A basic potion that tastes like saltwater.
entries.description_intermediate: A potion that grants +2 to Strength for 1 hour.
entries.description_advanced: A potion that grants the effects of the spell 'Enlarge' for 1 hour.

entries.description_basic: A simple cloak that smells of the ocean.
entries.description_intermediate: A cloak that provides resistance to cold damage and advantage on stealth checks in water.
entries.description_advanced: A magical cloak that allows the wearer to teleport up to 60 feet to a body of water once per day.

entries.description_basic: A rusty trident with no magical properties.
entries.description_intermediate: A trident that deals an extra 1d6 damage to creatures in water.
entries.description_advanced: A magical trident that can summon a wave to knock back enemies once per day.

entries.description_basic: A plain conch shell that produces no sound.
entries.description_intermediate: A shell that can be blown to create a sound that distracts enemies (DC 12 Wisdom save).
entries.description_advanced: A magical shell that can cast 'Thunderwave' once per day.

entries.description_basic: A worn book with illegible text.
entries.description_intermediate: A grimoire containing basic spells related to water and sea creatures.
entries.description_advanced: A powerful tome that grants the ability to cast 'Control Water' once per day.

entries.description_basic: A vial of black ink with no special properties.
entries.description_intermediate: A vial of ink that can be used to create magical scrolls.
entries.description_advanced: A magical ink that allows the user to write spells that can be cast as rituals.
